desc: Papillon Boutique is found in Los Angeles, specifically Redondo Beach, CA. We have experienced stylists who dress you in designers such as: Joseph Ribkoff, T.Ba,Komarov, Shahida Parides, Olvi's, Johnny Was, Byron Lars, Frank Lyman, etc. Weddings, Galas, Office, Daywear- boho, edgy, classic, find your style here!

layout.text: DESIGNER PIECES THAT FIT YOUR STYLE
